product.longDescription: The most versatile broccoli raab variety for growing throughout the season — especially for spring and summer harvest, and overwintering in mild climates. Large plants mature over a 1-2 week period. Large, tender, abundant leaves borne on thin stems with delicate buds. Avg. 15,500 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.

Spring Raab Broccoli Seed

Product ID:137.11137

The most versatile broccoli raab variety for growing throughout the season — especially for spring and summer harvest, and overwintering in mild climates. Large plants mature over a 1-2 week period. Large, tender, abundant leaves borne on thin stems with delicate buds. Avg. 15,500 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
